mapper.select: SELECT ical FROM calender WHERE ical=#{ical}
select imeal_record imealRecord,ifood,ical,uef_time uefTime,uef_kcal uefKcal,ctnt,uef_pic uefPic from user_meal_record
select sum(uef_kcal) from user_meal_record where ical=#{ical}
select f_kcal from food_category where ifood=#{ifood}
select created_at createdAt from calender where ical=#{ical}

select C.iuser,A.uef_kcal uefKcal,A.uef_time uefTime,date_format(A.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') createdAt from user_meal_record A inner join calender B on A.ical=B.ical inner join user C on B.iuser=C.iuser WHERE C.iuser=#{iuser} AND date_format(A.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY A.created_at asc;
